about.title: About Moorgan
about.subtitle: Transforming livestock management through innovative technology and sustainable practices
about.yearsExperience: Years of research and development in AI livestock monitoring
about.paragraph1: Moorgan combines cutting-edge AI algorithms with IoT sensors to create a comprehensive livestock monitoring system that helps farmers optimize their operations, improve animal welfare, and increase productivity while reducing environmental impact.
about.paragraph2: Built on Microsoft Azure's robust cloud infrastructure, our platform provides real-time insights, predictive analytics, and actionable recommendations to transform traditional farming into smart, sustainable agriculture.

benefits.reducedCosts: Reduced operational costs and resource usage

statistics.title: Our Impact
statistics.subtitle: Transforming livestock management with measurable results

vision.heading: Our Vision & Mission
vision.visionText: To revolutionize livestock management globally through innovative technology, creating a world where farming is efficient, sustainable, and humane, contributing to food security while minimizing environmental impact.
vision.missionText: Our mission is to empower farmers with cutting-edge AI and IoT solutions that optimize livestock health, productivity, and welfare while promoting sustainable agricultural practices aligned with global development goals.

testimonials.heading: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subheading: Hear from farmers and agricultural professionals using Moorgan

john.content: Moorgan has transformed how we manage our dairy farm. The real-time health monitoring has reduced disease outbreaks by 70% and improved our overall productivity.

maria.content: As a researcher, I'm impressed by the quality and accuracy of data provided by Moorgan. It's revolutionizing how we understand livestock behavior and health patterns.

robert.content: I've recommended Moorgan to dozens of my clients, and the feedback has been overwhelmingly positive. The ROI is clear within just a few months of implementation.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Find answers to common questions about Moorgan

q1.question: How does Moorgan's livestock monitoring system work?
q1.answer: Moorgan uses a combination of IoT sensors, wearable devices, and environmental monitors to collect real-time data about your livestock. This data is processed through our AI algorithms on Microsoft Azure to provide insights about health, behavior, and productivity.

q2.question: What kind of hardware is required for implementation?
q2.answer: Our system includes wearable sensors for animals, environmental monitoring stations, and a central hub that connects to the cloud. Our team handles the installation and setup process to ensure everything works seamlessly with your existing farm infrastructure.

q3.question: How long does it take to implement Moorgan on my farm?
q3.answer: Implementation time varies based on farm size and complexity, but typically takes 2-4 weeks from initial assessment to full deployment. Our team works closely with you throughout the process to minimize disruption to your operations.

q4.question: Can Moorgan integrate with my existing farm management software?
q4.answer: Yes, Moorgan is designed with open APIs that allow integration with most popular farm management systems. We also offer custom integration services for proprietary or legacy systems.

q5.question: What kind of ROI can I expect from implementing Moorgan?
q5.answer: Most farms see ROI within 6-12 months through reduced disease outbreaks, optimized feeding, improved productivity, and reduced labor costs. Our team can provide a customized ROI analysis based on your specific operation.

q6.question: Is my data secure and private?
q6.answer: Absolutely. Moorgan is built on Microsoft Azure's secure cloud infrastructure with enterprise-grade encryption and privacy controls. You maintain ownership of your data, and we adhere to strict data protection regulations.

deviceMaintenance.title: Device Maintenance
deviceMaintenance.description: Keeping your Moorgan devices in optimal condition

chargeCollar.question: How often should I charge the collar?
chargeCollar.answer: Moorgan collars typically last 2-3 weeks on a single charge, depending on usage.

collarRange.question: What's the range of the collar?
collarRange.answer: The standard range is up to 5 miles in open terrain, less in areas with obstacles.

collarWaterproof.question: Is the collar waterproof?
collarWaterproof.answer: Yes, Moorgan collars are IP67 rated, making them fully waterproof in up to 1 meter of water.

healthAccuracy.question: How accurate is the health monitoring?
healthAccuracy.answer: Our sensors are 95-98% accurate compared to veterinary equipment in controlled tests.

hero.title: Livestock Disease Detection
hero.subtitle: Upload an image of your livestock to detect potential diseases using our advanced AI technology

uploadArea.dragDropText: Drag and drop your image here

resultsArea.title: Detection Results
resultsArea.uploadImageMessage: Upload an image to see disease detection results

diseaseDetected.title: Disease Detected
diseaseDetected.description: Our system has detected a potential disease in your livestock image.

noDiseaseDetected.title: No Disease Detected
noDiseaseDetected.description: Good news! No signs of disease were detected in your livestock image.

resultsArea.diseaseDisclaimer: This is an AI-assisted diagnosis and should be confirmed by a veterinarian. Please consult with a professional for proper treatment.
resultsArea.healthyDisclaimer: Regular veterinary check-ups are still recommended even when no disease is detected by our system.

fmd.name: Foot-and-Mouth Disease (FMD)
fmd.description: Foot-and-Mouth Disease is a highly contagious viral disease affecting cloven-hoofed animals like cattle, sheep, and goats.

symptoms.blisters: Blisters and sores in the mouth and feet

recommendations.contactVet: Contact a veterinarian for diagnosis and treatment

normal.name: Healthy
normal.description: No signs of common livestock diseases were detected in the image.

recommendations.behavioralChanges: Keep monitoring for any behavioral changes

step1.title: 1. Upload Image
step1.description: Upload a clear image of your livestock from any angle that shows the animal clearly.

step2.title: 2. AI Analysis
step2.description: Our advanced AI analyzes the image for visual signs of common livestock diseases.

step3.title: 3. Get Results
step3.description: Receive detailed analysis with disease identification, symptoms, and recommended actions.

sanitation.title: Proper Sanitation
sanitation.description: Regularly clean and disinfect animal housing, feeding equipment, and water troughs. Proper sanitation is the first line of defense against disease spread.

vaccination.title: Vaccination Programs
vaccination.description: Implement and maintain a comprehensive vaccination program based on regional disease risks. Consult with your veterinarian for a customized schedule.

biosecurity.title: Biosecurity Measures
biosecurity.description: Control farm access, quarantine new animals, use clean equipment, and implement proper waste management to prevent disease introduction and spread.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Management
nutrition.description: Provide balanced nutrition tailored to your livestock's needs. Proper nutrition strengthens immune systems and increases resistance to disease.

monitoring.title: Regular Monitoring
monitoring.description: Observe your animals daily for unusual behavior or physical symptoms. Early detection is crucial for effective treatment and preventing spread.

guidance.title: Professional Guidance
guidance.description: Establish a relationship with a veterinarian specialized in livestock. Regular check-ups and professional advice are essential for herd health.
